response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our extraordinary product to you. This unique offering holds immense value and potential for you, estimated at $1,500,000. I understand its significance to you and would like to extend an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a carefully considered price. I propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring that you receive a valuable asset while also allowing me to achieve a fair return on this exceptional item. I believe this offer strikes the right balance between value and affordability. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1200000}
